MAIN_VIEW.DESCRIPCION: Full stack developer, with more than 4 years of experience in the world of programming.

ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPCION: Get to know my technical skills and the values that characterize me.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAFO_1: I enjoy delving into clients' problems and solving them using modern technologies. I have created web platforms for different companies around the world, always focusing on developing quality and highly scalable products.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAFO_2: Having constant curiosity is a skill that I have developed over the years, and this has allowed me to learn in-depth about the technologies I work with. I always have a good disposition to develop new skills and face challenges that arise on the way to my goals.
ABOUT_ME.PARAGRAFO_3: Meeting new people and listening to new perspectives is something I truly enjoy doing. Drop me a message if you want to talk about software development, new technologies, or grab a coffee.

JOBS.DESCRIPCION: Here are some software projects I've been involved in

TRABAJO1.DESCRIPCION: Fully functional replica of Europe's leading real estate company. Ver github

TRABAJO2.DESCRIPCION: The Mexican company, Backpackers. Dedicated to the marketing of tours worldwide. It required developing a web platform in which to publish its services, which had to have geolocation systems and integration with payment gateways. In addition, a control panel in which the information published on the web platform will be managed.

TRABAJO3.DESCRIPCION: Saber API integration. This api provides all the information for the commercialization of flights (prices, schedules, stopovers, etc). It was integrated with the web platform of the Mexican company, Backpackers.

TRABAJO4.DESCRIPCION: Open source project developed with Angular 14 which provides developers with a template to create their web portfolio. It's completely free! View github

RECOMMENDATIONS.DESCRIPCION: People I've worked with have said some nice things...

TESTIMONIO1.DESCRIPCION: I have known Daniel for more than five years, I was his programming teacher and I can attest to his technical skills, his excellent skills in terms of teamwork, communication, problem solving and leadership, and his discipline and dedication to work. I have also had the opportunity to share with Daniel and I know that he is a reliable person. So I think he can be an excellent addition to any work team.

TESTIMONIO2.DESCRIPCION: Daniel is an excellent proactive developer above all else and always looking for the best practices, we have participated and still continue in the joint development of platforms that have excellent performance in modern technologies.

FOOTER.DESCRIPCION: A software developer, with the sole purpose of serving the community and constantly learning.

CONTACT.DESCRIPCION: I am always ready to face new challenges. Tell me yours.

VALIDATIONS.MENSAJE_LONGITUD_MINIMA: The message must contain at least 30 character
VALIDATIONS.MENSAJE_LONGITUD_MAXIMA: The message must contain a maximum of 500 characters

SUCCESS.TITULO: !Cool! Together we will create great things
